page.title: 19The Councillor( 2)
page.content: {Councillor }states that {Gretna }has improved greatly during his term of office,especially in the last decade. {Gretna}is now by_passed on all sides allowing heavy traffic to avoid the town centre.Roads and footpaths are well maintained.The town now has two industrial sites belonging to the Regional Council and S.D.A. The general appearance has been improved by the local parks dept by tree and shrub planting , forming gardens and maintaining grass verges and open spaces.
